name: magb
text: Ray just wants to do what's right.

name: ghostd
text: Ray writes the way he speaks, He is one true dude.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: The "hey man" note cracks me up.

name: heyman
text: I make it a point to leave this note for every passed out friend

name: chrissketch
text: I have friends who make it a point to be that passed out friend.

name: fidget
text: i resent that

name: bourbonsamurai
text: I resemble that.

name: werewolves
text: I'll drink to that.

name: boredom_man
text: Hm. I always go with "I loved you for your body; there's a voice that sounds like God to me declaring that your body's really you."

name: hateandwar
text: This is the loveliest thing I've read in months, boredom_man.

name: boredom_man
text: I wrote it! Yeah! It was me!

name: widdershins
text: Teodor's eyes convey so vividly the feeling of pieces of your brain falling away, like a wet cake

name: rotating-dog
text: If oven cleaner can clean an oven, it can clean him

name: flurfy
text: Why does that sound so familiar?

name: widdershins
text: Black Books :)

name: rotating-dog
text: widdershins, we should put Black Books spam comments on ALL of the strips.

name: mthrfckr
text: The last two panels convey the feeling of a hangover so well- with the black speech bubble

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Sean Collins of Yale, USA and Gin Langan of Hayward, USA: top alt text writer applicants!"

name: relaxing
text: I demand that Sean and Gin report here what, if anything, became of this.

name: aaron_haynes
text: I've left this note next to a glass of water and some ibuprofen before. Ahhh, friendship.

name: aurorasbored
text: I automatically started groaning and groping for my glasses because of this one.

name: gumfish
text:
HEY
MAN
